question: I am a student and have to pay my fees online quite a few times which requires me to have a credit card
answer:
QUESTION

I am a student and have to pay my fees online quite a few times which requires me to have a credit card because the debit cards offered by the banks are not accepted. The problem is that in the banks charge an annual fees on having a credit card which in some banks is deducted on an monthly basis. Therefore, if I pay all my dues on time i.e before the interest accrues is it permissible for me to keep a credit card, if there are annual charges attached to it.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is permissible to make use of the credit card facility on condition payments to your account is made timeously to avoid paying interest.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
